extras.old_content:
directions = {} # this is the dictionary you should return, this dictionary have the calculated pca component(first one component) for each layer's hiddenstate
    raise NotImplementedError("The function 'get_rep_directions_agent' not implemented")
    
    return directions
extras.new_content:
directions = {}
    for layer in hidden_layers:
        H_train = hidden_states[layer]
        H_train_mean = H_train.mean(axis=0, keepdims=True)
        self.H_train_means[layer] = H_train_mean
        H_train_centered = recenter(H_train, mean=H_train_mean).cpu()
        H_train_np = H_train_centered.numpy() if hasattr(H_train_centered, 'numpy') else np.array(H_train_centered)
        pca_model = PCA(n_components=self.n_components, whiten=False).fit(H_train_np)
        directions[layer] = pca_model.components_
    return directions
